title: Bertrand Russell discusses philosophy
brief_description: Lord Russell gives his definition of philosophy and speaks of the relationship and difference between science and philosophy. He describes his own philosophy and discusses the uses of philosophy, the trends of present-day philosophy and the future. No other credits available.
